title: Handmade Burger Company - Central Station
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Western, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Burger chain restaurant, this one opened Sept 2015 as part of the opening of the train station and shopping centre. Menu has a veggie burger section, with 4 vegan options: Cajun vegetable & bean, spinach & lentil, sweet potato & bean and chickpea & quinoa. There are also vegan suitable sides, salads and veg skewers plus soymilk for milkshakes. Vegan items labeled.
